text: Avoid the Dell Inspiron 7000 Gaming Edition 15.6 Full HD Laptop,Intel Core i5-7300HQ(up 3.5Ghz), 1 TB Hybrid HDD+256G SSD,12G DDR4,NVIDIA GTX 1050 Graphics, Bluetooth 4.2,Wind10,Compatible Windows Mixed Reality if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

Had several issues with the Dell Inspiron 7000 Gaming Edition 15.6 Full HD Laptop,Intel Core i5-7300HQ(up 3.5Ghz), 1 TB Hybrid HDD+256G SSD,12G DDR4,NVIDIA GTX 1050 Graphics, Bluetooth 4.2,Wind10,Compatible Windows Mixed Reality since day one. blue screens occasionally and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the Dell Inspiron 7000 Gaming Edition 15.6 Full HD Laptop,Intel Core i5-7300HQ(up 3.5Ghz), 1 TB Hybrid HDD+256G SSD,12G DDR4,NVIDIA GTX 1050 Graphics, Bluetooth 4.2,Wind10,Compatible Windows Mixed Reality since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the Dell Inspiron 7000 Gaming Edition 15.6 Full HD Laptop,Intel Core i5-7300HQ(up 3.5Ghz), 1 TB Hybrid HDD+256G SSD,12G DDR4,NVIDIA GTX 1050 Graphics, Bluetooth 4.2,Wind10,Compatible Windows Mixed Reality since day one. performance throttles under load and the screen brightness feels cheap. Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Dell Inspiron 7000 Gaming Edition 15.6 Full HD Laptop,Intel Core i5-7300HQ(up 3.5Ghz), 1 TB Hybrid HDD+256G SSD,12G DDR4,NVIDIA GTX 1050 Graphics, Bluetooth 4.2,Wind10,Compatible Windows Mixed Reality. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The battery life has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
